Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin 21 (Brevinin-1E truncated peptide 21; Frogs, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.9748603]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538 (MIC=12.5 μg/ml), Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=25 μg/ml), Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341 (MIC=6.25 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 2592 (MIC=12.5 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027 (MIC=12.5 μg/ml);Fungus:Candida albicans ATCC 36232 (MIC=6.25 μg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.9748603]HD50=77 μg/ml(oxidized); HD50=110 μg/ml(reduced) against mouse red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive bacteria, Gram-negative bacteria and fungi. Has hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity analysis of brevinin 1E amide, an antimicrobial peptide from Rana esculenta.
Literature.Author: Kwon MY, Hong SY, Lee KH.
